predicate.note: Frames file for 'fling' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry throw-17.1, other framed members include fire, kick, pass, and throw. Framenet entries Body Movement and Cause to Move. Comparison with throw.

roleset.name: throw

example.name: boring example
example.text: He already has achieved vertical integration on a limited scale: Quebecor can put a weekly newspaper on almost any Quebec doorstep without using outside help, from chopping down the tree to making the newsprint to *trace* flinging it up onto the porch.

roleset.note: Actually, I prefer the simple past form of "flang", but I seem to be alone in that.
